messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage radius of the explosion in yards?
2 yards, 3 yards, etc.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the damage when the range is double or triple?
The damage is halved at double the range and quartered at triple the range.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can assault rifles be used for burst or full auto firing?
No, Assault Rifle: Use Rifle/Shotgun skill when firing single shot; use Submachine skill when firing burst or full auto.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of skill is required for burst or full auto firing?
Submachine skill is required for burst or full auto firing.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can automatic weapons be switched to fire burst or full auto?
Some automatic weapons can be switched to fire burst or full auto; such firearms are usually unavailable to civilians; prices reflect black-market.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect on damage when the range of an explosion is up to double the original range?
The damage is halved.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a chainsaw malfunctions?
The engine stalls or the chain jams or becomes displaced.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does a major wound from a chainsaw cause?
It severs a random limb.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage a dynamite stick and a hand grenade deliver to those within 3 yards?
Each delivers 4D10 damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage a hand grenade delivers to those within 6 yards?
It delivers 2D10 damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a chainsaw hits the user's body?
The chain connects with the user's body (2D8 damage)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does a dynamite stick and a hand grenade deliver to those within 3 yards?
Each delivers 4D10 damage to those within 3 yards
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage per round for the Garrote attack?
1D6 damage per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to hand-fire a GE Mini-Gun?
A minimum Build 2
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many shots can a handgun fire per round with the penalty die?
One shot per round, with one penalty die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the maximum number of shots in one round denote?
Number in brackets denotes maximum number of shots that may be fired in one round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the LAW weapon used for?
LAW: Light Antitank Weapon, disposable.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what conditions can Mace spray be used?
Mace spray: Do not use the point-blank range rule for this weapon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do most rifles except the .45 Martini-Henry Rifle and Col. Moran’s Air Rifle fire?
Most rifles except .45 Martini-Henry Rifle and Col. Moran’s Air Rifle fire 1 shot per round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of assault rifles?
Assault rifles have a fire selector allowing for single shots or 3-round burst or full automatic fire.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What reloading takes time?
Reloading
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What fire mode does an assault rifle allow for?
Single shots, 3-round burst, or full automatic fire
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can shotguns impale targets?
No, shotguns cannot impale targets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What damage can a shotgun blast at close range do?
24 damage

What is the effect of a Taser on stunned targets?
Incapsitated for 1D6 rounds
